item.title: Fly Me To The Moon (In Other Words)
item.description: by Bobby Womack Fly me Fly me to the moon And let me play among the stars Let me see Oh I wanna see what spring is like On a-Jupiter On a-Jupiter and Mars In other words, hold my hand In other words, darling, i love ya Oh, fill Fill my heart with song I wanna sing for you darling For ever more baby You, are all that I long for

item.title: Don’t Let Me Down
item.description: by Twisted Sister Look at you You’re my dream Are you all that you seem? Now you have what I need And what I believe Don’t tell me you’ll lose it ‘Cause I’ll have to leave Don’t let me down Don’t let me down Don’t let me down Don’t let me down What do I have to give Until you let me live? You’re all that I work for

item.title: Simple Shortcode to Insert Raw HTML in Hugo
item.description: I love the simplicity of creating new content using markdown in Hugo. But sometimes, markdown is not enough – you might want to do a one-off extra-fancy thing with raw html. Surprisingly, Hugo doesn’t seem to have a good way to let you do this in a content file. Here is how to create your own one-line custom shortcode to make that possible. Add a shortcode template to your site, in layouts/shortcodes/rawhtml.

item.title: Hugo: Setup and Deploy Site using GitHub Actions
item.description: Si estas usando HUGO para generar tu blog, proyecto o sitio web seguro estás familiarizado con la línea de comando para construir y testear tu sitio en de forma local para luego subirlo con a tu repositorio de preferencia. Para muchos es un desafio mantener un proyecto de esta manera, en especial al no contar con una interfaz gráfica al estilo Wordpress y menos si tenes que hacer cambios continuos a un artículo o subir varios artículos al día.

item.title: Introduction to Hugo Templating
item.description: Hugo uses Go’s ’html/template’ and ‘text/template’ libraries as the basis for the templating. The following is only a primer on Go Templates. For an in-depth look into Go Templates, check the official Go docs. Go Templates provide an extremely simple template language that adheres to the belief that only the most basic of logic belongs in the template or view layer.

item.title: Your branch is ahead of Origin/Master by X Commits
item.description: Imagina el siguiente escenario. Al momento de aplicar los cambios en el servidor de producción verificas el estado actual del repositorio local antes de traer los cambios hechos en tu repositorio en remoto y te das cuenta de que tu rama local se encuentra por delante de la rama ‘origin/master’ tal como se muestra a continuación. git status # On branch master # Your branch is ahead of 'origin/master' by X commits.
